text: August Sander (17 November 1876 â€“ 20 April 1964) was a German photographer. He is known for his work on portrait and documentary photography during the Weimar Republic. He tried to portray elements from all German society at that time. His most important book was Face of our Time (1929). Category:1876 births Category:1964 deaths Category:German photographers
title: August Sander
